QAPair.Question: What is (are) Ankle sprain - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: Ligaments are strong, flexible tissues that attach your bones to one another. They keep your joints stable and help them move in the right ways. An ankle sprain occurs when the ligaments in your ankle are stretched or torn.
